content: around next 6 sts x 4 slip_stitch in 1st st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 8 x 5loop puffs 4 chain 48 bpdc 20 fpdc 32 double_crochet round 12 willow start in any cr space work 6 double_crochet 1 fpdc around puff 1 bpdc around next25 sts 1 fpdc around puff x 4 slip_stitch in 1st st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 8 fpdc 24 double_crochet 100 bpdc round 13 willow start in space between 3rd and 4th double_crochet of 6 dcs made in cr space from previous round make 1 half_double_crochet chain 1 1 half_double_crochet in space 1 bphdc in next 4 sts 1 double_crochet in next 25 sts 1 bphdc around next 4 sts x 4 slip_stitch in 1st st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 32 bphdc 8 half_double_crochet 4 chain 100 double_crochet page 6 of 8 round 14 lime start in any cr space work 1 half_double_crochet chain 1 1 half_double_crochet in space 1 bphdc in next 5 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 25 sts x 4 slip_stitch in 1st st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 40 bphdc 108 half_double_crochet 4 chain round 15 willow _ start in any cr space work 3 double_crochet in space 1 double_crochet in next 37 sts x 4 slip_stitch in 1st st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 160 double_crochet 4 chain round 14 lime start in any cr space work 3 single_crochet in space 1 single_crochet in next 39 sts x 4 slip_stitch in 1st st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 168 single_crochet page 7 of 8 facebook link https //www facebook com/emmy deb 50 facebook blog https //www facebook com/emmy-de-b-crochet-1467776363369171/ ref=br_rs email address 1emmydeb@gmail com copyright emmy de b 2018 all rights reserved this pattern is for unlimited personal use only do not reproduce or sell the pattern the pattern and photos may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full page 8 of 8
